Title: Bars recovery for personal injuries incurred by persons committing crimes from the victim or person acting on behalf of the victim
Summary: Bars completely the recovery of damages from the victim or a person acting on behalf of the victim for personal injury sustained by a person convicted of a crime when such injury occurred during the commission of such crime or while fleeing therefrom.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to establishing a complete bar to recovery by persons injured while committing a crime
